mapper.select: select * from board WHERE artist_no=#{artist_no} order by reg_date DESC
select * from board order by reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board(artist_no, title, content, reg_date, board_private, thumbnail, artist_name, artist_profile_img) VALUES (#{artist_no}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{board_private}, #{thumbnail}, #{artist_name}, #{artist_profile_img})
mapper.update: update board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, revise_date=now(), thumbnail=#{thumbnail} WHERE board_no=#{board_no}
update board SET comment_number = comment_number + #{number} WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
update board SET like_number = like_number + #{number} WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
